class.name: EditorScenePostImport
class.brief_description: Base script for post-processing scenes being imported.
class.description: These scripts can modify scenes after being imported by the 3D Scene import option of the Import menu.

method.name: post_import
method.description: This function is called upon import with the imported scene. Just do any changes desired to the scene and return it. If null is returned, import will fail and throw an error to the user.
